original_title: Sieben Mal am Tag beklagen wir unser Los und nachts stehen wir auf, um nicht zu tr√§umen
overview: A cinematic devotional book. Based on interviews with an unemployable sufferer (and his fellows), living in the East German countryside. Who lost his memory in 1989 and woke up into several nightmares.
tagline: Seven Times a Day We Bemoan Our Lot and at Night We Get Up to Avoid Our Dreams
title: Seven Times a Day We Bemoan Our Lot and at Night We Get Up to Avoid Our Dreams
